price: Sila kakuulee nurratti taheetu kan Guyyaa Qiyaamaa keessatti bakka ga'aa ta'etu isiniif jira moo ‘wanti isin murteessitan isiniif jira’ jechuun?
arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am lakum aymānun ʿalaynā bālighatun ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati inna lakum lamā taḥkumūna
